org.cs2c.nginlib.monitor
接口 IOStatus

public interface IOStatus

作者：
Mikes

This interface is used to get the remote real-time info of IO which has been fetch from remote host. The instance implementing the interface is related with general IO status of a specific time. The operate is off-line, and the instance state-less.

方法摘要
 float getBlockInPerSec()
          Get current general IO input rate (block_ps) which has already fetched from remote host.
 float getBlockOutPerSec()
          Get current general IO output rate (block_ps) which has already fetched from remote host.
 java.util.List<Device> getDevices()
          Get each device IO status info, which has already fetched from remote host.
 

方法详细信息

getBlockInPerSec

float getBlockInPerSec()
Get current general IO input rate (block_ps) which has already fetched from remote host.

返回：
The current general IO input rate (block_ps).

getBlockOutPerSec

float getBlockOutPerSec()
Get current general IO output rate (block_ps) which has already fetched from remote host.

返回：
The current general IO output rate (block_ps).

getDevices

java.util.List<Device> getDevices()
Get each device IO status info, which has already fetched from remote host.

返回：
A list of device status info access interface.
